about_page.about_text: Show support for U.S. Soccer by inscribing a brick at the Arthur M. Blank U.S. Soccer National Training Center!
about_page.subheader_text:
(1) personalized brick to be installed and (1) complimentary
Keepsake Replica of your personalized brick to be shipped to your
home with an official program plaque. 12” x 12“ Keepsake Replicas are
displayed as 12” x 12” framed tiles of your personalized brick. With your Keepsake Replica, you will receive a Certificate
of Recognition as authentication of your purchase and placement at the Arthur M. Blank U.S. Soccer National Training Center.  Display cases for your complimentary Keepsake Replica and
additional Keepsake Replicas are available to purchase with any brick
selection.

shop_page.page_title: For international orders please call 1-888-428-2001. All materials subject to change based on final architectural design.
shop_page.sub_header_text: Packages include: (1) Brick to be installed; (1) Keepsake Replica for your home or office.

product_page.page_title: Enter an inscription below to customize your brick. Inscriptions are center justified. View our inscription guidelines for more information.
product_page.product_additional_items_text: Bring your U.S. Soccer pride home with keepsake items that proudly showcase your personalized message. These special edition items are perfect gifts for graduations, holidays, birthdays and more! Replica bricks are engraved with the same message as your installed U.S. Soccer brick.
product_page.inscription_guidelines_link:
Inscription Guidelines (4" x 8" & 8" x 8" brick options):
Your personalized message can be engraved with up to 16 characters per line, including blank spaces. A character is any letter, number, symbol or punctuation mark found on a standard English keyboard. All text will automatically be center justified and engraved in UPPERCASE letters. Messages containing websites, phone numbers, social media handles, emojis and/or manifestos are not permitted. Discriminatory, political, offensive or unsuitable messages as determined by U.S. Soccer will be declined. U.S. Soccer reserves the right to decline inscriptions for any reason. Should your inscription require revision, your order will be placed on hold and you will be contacted for assistance in submitting an alternative inscription.

Inscription Guidelines (12" x 12" brick options):
Your personalized message can be engraved with up to 20 characters per line, including blank spaces. A character is any letter, number, symbol or punctuation mark found on a standard English keyboard. All text will automatically be center justified and engraved in UPPERCASE letters. Messages containing websites, phone numbers, social media handles, emojis and/or manifestos are not permitted. Discriminatory, political, offensive or unsuitable messages as determined by U.S. Soccer will be declined. U.S. Soccer reserves the right to decline inscriptions for any reason. Should your inscription require revision, your order will be placed on hold and you will be contacted for assistance in submitting an alternative inscription.
product_page.package_notes: *This image is for representation only and is not an exact reflection of your completed brick. All materials subject to change based on final architectural design.

stories.share_disclaimer: By submitting your story and related photos, you grant U.S. Soccer, its affiliates and partners irrevocable permission to use your story and/or to create derivative works and/or adaptations of your story for marketing purposes, including, but not limited to social media, television, radio, and print marketing. Further, your submission of this form indicates your authorization for U.S. Soccer to contact you for additional information.

faq.question: What are people putting on their bricks?
faq.answer: Click here to view inscription examples to nudge your creativity.

faq.question: What can I have engraved on my brick?
faq.answer: Any letter, number, symbol or punctuation mark found on a standard English keyboard can be engraved. Messages containing websites, phone numbers, social media handles, and/or manifestos are not permitted. Discriminatory, political, offensive or unsuitable messages as determined by U.S. Soccer will be declined. U.S. Soccer reserves the right to decline inscriptions for any reason. Should your inscription require revision, your order will be placed on hold and you will be contacted for assistance in submitting an alternative inscription.

faq.question: How will my inscription appear on my brick?
faq.answer: All text will be centered and engraved in UPPERCASE, except if requested for proper name formatting (i.e., McKENZIE, DeBOUR, etc.).

faq.question: How long can my message be?
faq.answer: 4” x 8” bricks can be engraved with one to three (1-3) lines of text with up to sixteen (16) characters per line. 8” x 8” bricks can be engraved with one to six (1-6) lines of text with up to sixteen (16) characters per line. 8” x 8” bricks with U.S. Soccer logo can be engraved with one to four (1-4) lines of text with up to sixteen (16) characters per line. 12” x 12” bricks with U.S. Soccer logo can be engraved with one to six (1-6) lines of text with up to twenty (20) characters per line.

faq.question: Can I change my inscription?
faq.answer: Changes may be made to your order within 1 business day of receipt of your order confirmation, after which your order may be scheduled for production and changes may not be possible.

faq.question: How do I place an order internationally?
faq.answer: Please call 1-888-428-2001 and a customer service specialist will be happy to assist you in placing your order. Additional shipping charges will be quoted and applied at checkout.

faq.question: How long do I have to place my order?
faq.answer: Space is limited, so act now to ensure you are included in this exciting opportunity!

faq.question: What do I do if I haven't received my email order confirmation?
faq.answer: If you have not received your confirmation email, please check your junk folder. If you still cannot locate your confirmation, please call 1-888-428-2001 for additional assistance.

faq.question: Is my purchase tax deductible?
faq.answer: A portion of your donation may be tax deductible to the extent allowed by law. A donation receipt will be provided.

faq.question: How do I pay by check?
faq.answer: Please call 1-888-428-2001 to receive an order form and instructions on how to order by mail.

faq.question: What do the proceeds of my order benefit?
faq.answer: The U.S. Soccer Brick Program is officially provided by U.S. Soccer, with net proceeds benefiting the Arthur M. Blank National Training Facility.

faq.question: Where will my brick be installed?
faq.answer: Bricks will be featured at the Arthur M. Blank U.S. Soccer National Training Facility in Atlanta, GA.

faq.question: When will my brick be installed?
faq.answer: The engraved bricks are tentatively scheduled to be installed in late 2025-early 2026.

faq.question: How will I find my installed brick?
faq.answer: Once installed, you will receive a notification with further instruction on how to find your brick.

faq.question: How many bricks are available?
faq.answer: Space is limited, so act now to ensure you are included in this exciting opportunity!

faq.question: What is a replica brick?
faq.answer: A replica brick is engraved with the same personalized message as your installed brick, to proudly showcase your U.S. Soccer pride at home or the office. These special edition items are perfect gifts for graduations, holidays, birthdays and more! They also include a commemorative plaque affixed to the top or, in the case of 12x12 replica bricks, in a black frame! Colors may vary slightly.

faq.question: What is a display case?
faq.answer: Display cases are laser-engraved with U.S. Soccer artwork and allow you to proudly display your replica brick.

faq.question: What is a keepsake certificate?
faq.answer: Keepsake certificates are frameable certificates customized with your brick message. This not only authenticates your purchase but also can be given as a gift. Keepsake certificates are mailed within 2-4 weeks of your purchase.

faq.question: Can keepsake items be shipped to a different address?
faq.answer: Yes, with the exception of P.O. boxes or APO’s.

faq.question: When will I receive my replica brick and display case?
faq.answer: Please allow 10-12 weeks for creation and shipping of your brick. To expedite your order please call 1-888-428-2001.

faq.question: How do I order additional keepsake items after I have placed my initial order?
faq.answer: Please call 1-888-428-2001 to place your order with a customer service specialist.

terms_conditions.terms_conditions:
PRIVACY POLICY

Under partnership with U.S. Soccer, Fund Raisers Sports operates this program and may provide information about this transaction, including your contact information, items purchased, transaction totals, and other personally identifiable information to U.S. Soccer for their records.  Fund Raisers Sports does not sell or distribute customer information to unaffiliated parties, except when required by public records laws as applicable in your location. 

 

ORDER REVIEW PERIOD, ORDER CHANGES, AND CANCELLATIONS

Once your order and payment have been successfully submitted, you will receive a confirmation email.  This will be your final opportunity to verify accuracy of important order details:

-          Custom engravings and/or personalization (if applicable)

-          Item selection and quantity

-          Contact information, billing address and shipping address(es) for future program correspondence

NOTICE: After one (1) business day your order may be scheduled for production and/or shipment, after which, changes and cancellations may not be possible.

 

ORDER APPROVAL

Any order containing personalized inscriptions or customizations is subject to approval by the program, who reserve the right to review and approve (or decline) each order for appropriateness and grammatical integrity.  Personalized inscriptions or customizations determined to be in violation of program inscription policies as interpreted by the program will require revision, at which time you will be contacted and asked to submit an alternate inscription.  All declined orders will be placed on hold until revisions are submitted and approved.

NOTICE: If after ten (10) business days from the date of notification of a declined order you have not submitted alternate inscription, your order will be subject to cancellation and will be refunded.

 

DELIVERY TIMELINE

Unless otherwise indicated, all orders will ship within 8-12 weeks from date of successful order submission (payment successfully processed; order received).  If you require your order in a shorter timeframe, please call us and a customer service specialist will be happy to provide available options and pricing.

Fund Raisers Sports and its partners are not subject to liability for any delivery delays caused by events or circumstances outside of its control, including but not limited to weather conditions, mechanical delays, acts of God, or acts or omissions of public authorities (including customs and health officials).

Please be advised that products purposed for installation at a venue, facility, or other location will ship in accordance with construction timelines set forth.

 

MATERIALS AND INSTALLATION LOCATION

All designs, images, and materials associated with any brick(s), replica brick(s), display case(s), and location of installation, whether transmitted online, through official program marketing and communications, or verbally, are preliminary and subject to change without notice based on final architectural design.

 

SHIPMENTS OUTSIDE THE CONTIGUOUS UNITED STATES

Additional fees may apply for shipments to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, and any international country or territory.  Please call us to process an order shipping outside the contiguous United States.

 

DAMAGED OR DEFECTIVE MERCHANDISE

If you have received a damaged or defective product, please notify us immediately by phone (Monday-Friday 8:30am to 5:00pm MT).  Your customer service specialist may require photos depicting the damage or defect for use in quality assurance and/or damage claims with the shipping carrier.  Subject to availability and confirmation, your damaged or defective product will be replaced at no cost to you.

NOTICE: Due to the nature of products that are personalized and/or have limited availability, please be advised that damaged or defective products must be reported within five (5) business days of delivery (Monday-Friday 8:30am to 5:00pm MT).  Damaged or defective products reported outside of this timeframe will not be eligible for replacement (subject to availability).

 

INSCRIPTION ERRORS AND MISSING PAVERS

Pavers that cannot be located after installation or are found to contain inscription errors must be reported within 4 months from the date of installation, after which, pavers eligible for reproduction and installation will be installed. Once installed, you will be notified. Pavers that cannot be located or contain inscription errors reported after 4 months will not be eligible for installation. 

PAYMENT CARD INFORMATION

Fund Raisers Sports values your security and privacy, therefore this website utilizes with industry-standard SSL with 256-bit encryption when handling your payment card information. SSL is a widely-used protocol designed to securely exchange information between a client and a server.  When a URL address contains HTTPS, the 'S' indicates that data is being transmitted securely using this protocol.  For maximum security, use of private, password-secured networks is recommended.

Fund Raisers Sports is fully PCI Compliant. The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is a set of security standards designed to ensure that ALL companies that accept, process, store or transmit credit card information maintain a secure environment.

confirmation_page.email_text:
Thank you for supporting the U.S. Soccer Brick Program and congratulations on commemorating your U.S. Soccer legacy!

This will be your final opportunity to verify accuracy of important order details:
-          Custom engravings and/or personalization
-          Item selection and quantity
-          Contact information, billing address and shipping address(es) for future program correspondence

For questions about your order, you can reply to this email or reach us by phone by calling 1-888-428-2001.

Messages containing websites, phone numbers, social media handles, and/or manifestos are not permitted. Discriminatory, political, offensive or unsuitable messages as determined by U.S. Soccer will be declined. U.S. Soccer reserves the right to decline inscriptions for any reason. Should your inscription require revision, your order will be placed on hold and you will be contacted for assistance in submitting an alternative inscription.

NOTICE: After one (1) business day your order will be scheduled for production and/or shipment, after which, changes and cancellations may not be possible.

Unless otherwise indicated, replica bricks are expected to ship within 10-12 weeks of successful order once approved.  If your order includes more than one item, they will be shipped separately. A complimentary certificate authenticating your order will be mailed within 2-4 weeks. U.S. Soccer will receipt all brick campaign donations on a monthly basis. 

All designs, images, and materials associated with any brick(s), replica brick(s), display case(s), and location of installation, whether transmitted online, through official program marketing and communications, or verbally, are preliminary and subject to change without notice based on final architectural design.

We look forward to seeing you and your brick at the Arthur M. Blank U.S. Soccer National Training Facility in Atlanta, GA! 

Sincerely,
U.S. Soccer Brick Program
confirmation_page.order_confirmation_text:
Thank you for supporting the U.S. Soccer Brick Program and congratulations on commemorating your U.S. Soccer  legacy with a brick!

Your order is being processed! A confirmation detailing your order and next steps will be emailed to you. Please check your junk folder. If you do not receive your email in the next 24 hours, please call 1-888-428-2001 to speak with a customer service specialist.
